import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({ history, match }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const addToCartHandler = () => { history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } const addDecimels = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100)/ 100).toFixed(2) } return ( <> Go back {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

{product.name}

 Price: {product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: addDecimels(${product.price}) Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : ' Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty: setQty(e.target.value)} > {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( ))} )} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
